DOC.brief_summary: This study is comparing two different kinds of splints for patients who have had a surgical contracture release of dupuytren's disease. It compares a static splint and a dynamic splint.
DOC.criteria: 18 years or older males and females with Dupuytren's contracture patients with contracture of less than 30 degrees of MCP contractions and no contractions of the IP joints previous surgical treatment for Dupuytren's contracture of MCP greater than 30 degrees contraindications for dynamic splinting (upper limb amputees, paresis, ect.)
